pizzas.name: Neapolitan Style Pizza
pizzas.description: Classic Neapolitan pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil leaves, oregano, and olive oil.

pizzas.name: Chicago Style Pizza
pizzas.description: Deep-dish pizza with mozzarella, ground beef, sausage, pepperoni, onion, mushrooms, and green peppers.

pizzas.name: New York Style Pizza
pizzas.description: Large, foldable slices with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese, perfect for adding your favorite toppings.

pizzas.name: Sicilian Style Pizza
pizzas.description: Thick-cut pizza with pillowy dough, crunchy crust, robust tomato sauce, and optional cheese.

pizzas.name: Greek Style Pizza
pizzas.description: Thick and chewy crust with tangy tomato paste, mozzarella, cheddar, provolone, feta cheese, black olives, and red onion.

pizzas.name: California Style Pizza
pizzas.description: Gourmet pizza with inventive toppings like chicken, artichokes, goat cheese, and egg.

pizzas.name: Detroit Style Pizza
pizzas.description: Square pizza with pepperoni, brick cheese, and tomato sauce, featuring a thick, crispy crust.

pizzas.name: St. Louis Style Pizza
pizzas.description: Thin, cracker-like crust with Provel cheese and sweet tomato sauce, cut into small rectangles.
